CustomField.formula: CASE ( Price__c , "A", IMAGE("/img/samples/color_green.gif", "Strong", 10, 100) & " A", "B", IMAGE("/img/samples/color_green.gif", "Strong", 10, 80) & " B", "C", IMAGE("/img/samples/color_yellow.gif", "At risk", 10, 60) & " C", "D", IMAGE("/img/samples/color_yellow.gif", "At risk", 10, 40) & " D", "F", IMAGE("/img/samples/color_red.gif", "Danger", 10, 20) & " F", "No response")
CustomField.label: Price
